Newsletter

I curate a personal newsletter where you can expect various reflections on cyber security, privacy and surveillance. You can also expect links I have found interesting, as well as books that Iâ€™m reading or updates on art projects I am working on.

Subscribe to the Newsletter now! Yes, you can also receive it PGP encrypted.

If you subscribe, your email address is only stored on a server I run with an open source newsletter software called Mailtrain, and it is not shared with anyone. The emails I send do not track clicks, do not carry advertisement, or otherwise attempt to invade your privacy in any possible way. Additionally, I only write plain-text emails (disable HTML view!).
